question: Been off the pill a year now...still have fluid retention in abdomen area. I've seen a doc been tested no diabetes so that was ruled out... pelvic and abdomen ultrasound came back fine...running out of options ..my doc said i'm the first she has seen with this problem. I am always dehydrated and drink a lot of water and urinate regularly. Anyone else have this problem? The fluid retention is only in my abdomen and I've a small person so its very noticeable and uncomfortable.
title: water retention
